alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations; North Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 3:39PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Converse County through 415 PM MDT... At 338 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Douglas, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Douglas. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 126 and 150. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Converse County Lower Elevations; North Laramie Range
